colour.characterisation.cameras Module¶

Cameras Spectral Sensitivities¶

Defines spectral power distributions classes for the dataset from colour.characterisation.dataset.cameras module:

  • RGB_SpectralSensitivities: Implements support for a camera RGB spectral sensitivities.

See also

Cameras Jupyter Notebook

class colour.characterisation.cameras.RGB_SpectralSensitivities(name, data)[source]¶

Bases: colour.colorimetry.spectrum.TriSpectralPowerDistribution

Implements support for a camera RGB spectral sensitivities.

Parameters:
  • name (unicode) – Camera name.
  • data (dict) – Camera RGB spectral sensitivities data.
red¶
green¶

Return type:SpectralPowerDistribution
